What cult?
Ancestral Cult. They are the most popular religious group around here. It seems even goblins give them high regards.

...This is why you should always keep your eyes open and report and suspicious activities.
Hmm? You must be the new ruler of this village. My name is Dimitrus. Pleased to meet you.
This is the Mayor, Sir Arron. And my name is Rose. We are pleased to meet you as well.
Hmm? What were you talking about just now?
This is my mission, to explain to everyone the danger of Demons. Since you had no idea, allow me to repeat myself for you.
(propose a choice: a. Listen obediently, b. Listen disinterestedly both choices lead to same conclusion)
Despite how peaceful this world might look to you, there's evil beings we call Demons, who always aim to invade and destroy all which is good for us.
Seems nasty. Why would they do this?
They feed from the world's life energy and since their world has became a barren wasteland, they have been attempting to come here for centuries.
But what do they look like?

They take many forms, but mostly they disguise as sentient beings. This is why you should be especially careful around any strangers. They might lie how they lost their memory or came from some other world, but our interrogations have shown it all to be lies.
Anyone, looking suspicious or appeared from nowhere should be reported to Ancestral Cult immediately. We are doing our best to keep this order in piece.
*Gulp*
You are doing God's work, Demitrius, we'll make sure contact you on the spot.
If that's the only thing you've came for, we can do our best to help you with supplies on your way back.
I'm glad you asked. In fact, I have a cult's mission on my shoulders, I'd be pleased to have your help with.
What could it be?
There has been a report about an unknown artifact located in nearby caverns. Sometimes such things appear in our world and if it's connected to Demons, it's my job to ensure it's harmless.
As you can see, I'm no fighter, so your escort would be greatly appreciated.
(With all respect, I think it would be best for us to refuse this task.)
Of course our mayor will gladly help you out, Father. He often skirmishes outside and can handle himself in battle.
... I guess we should've hurried with that law invention.
I mean, we gladly will help you out, Father Demitrius.
I'm glad to know this village is so highly spirited. Once you prepare, I'll be waiting you at the exit.
